title: [Self-directed] Learning Course Based on Architectural Structural Mechanics Simulation Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational structural mechanics theory and basic proficiency in CAD software
context.additional_context: Field-intensive educational environment for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze stress distribution in truss structures under given load conditions using simulation tools.
Learners can explain a structure optimization design process in at least three stages through inquiry-based activities.
Learners can present structural analysis results applied to real architectural cases in a 10-minute team project presentation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
